channel.title: Crystal-RS |Grand-Opening|Staff Needed|24/7|VPS|No Lag|
channel.description:
[img]http://blog.flamingtext.com/blog/2012/11/23/flamingtext_com_1353707056_895768960.png[/img]
Introduction:
Crystal-RS is back from it’s long-time absence, and is welcoming new players to come and try out this server! So please come and take a look at our Grand Opening of Crystal-RS. To celebrate this re-opening, there will be a “Double XP Event” for one whole week! And don’t worry about the time, because we’re online 24/7. Nonetheless it’s easy to join the server, since we have a webclient.
Date:
-Grand-Opening: Saturday 24th of November 2012 -Double XP Event: 24-11-2012 / 01-12-2012
[By the way we’re looking for Staff Members at the moment. If you are interested, and you believe you could help this server, please take contact with us. (Via forum or webclient, PM’s etc.)]
Features:
•Full-screen mode •24/7 Online •Custom mini-games •Most skills [100%] •No DC’s, very stable •Barbarian Assault •Redone Dungeoneering w/ no smuggling •Etc.
Pics:
Full Duelling! [IMG]http://www.truploader.com/uploads/11_24_2012/950632screenshot1.jpg[/img]
Fullscreen! [img]http://www.truploader.com/uploads/11_24_2012/693565screenshot2.jpg[/img]
Turmoil! [img]http://www.truploader.com/uploads/2_23_2012/820900dungemote2.png[/img]
Background Information:
Crystal-RS has been started in 2010 by the owners: “Svenie1 and Yoshi”. After a few days the server began to increase faster and faster. After a while we had build up a decent community. But.. eventually we had no time left to spent on the server, because of school. And unfortunately, players began to leave then, and finally Crystal-RS was gone. (Despite that, we are making our comeback, and we will seriously get back to work again. To satisfy our players, and let them have a great experience in this server.)
We hope we’ll see you at the Opening and we wish you to have the utmost fun!
Greetings, Yoshi and Svenie1
Visit: http://crystal-rs.com/

item.description:
@YoshiCRS wrote:

Introduction:

Crystal-RS is back from it’s long-time absence, and is welcoming new players to come and try out this server! So please come and take a look at our Grand Opening of Crystal-RS.
To celebrate this re-opening, there will be a “Double XP Event” for one whole week!
And don’t worry about the time, because we’re online 24/7. Nonetheless it’s easy to join the server, since we have a webclient.

Date:

-Grand-Opening: Saturday 24th of November 2012
-Double XP Event: 24-11-2012 / 01-12-2012

[By the way we’re looking for Staff Members at the moment. If you are interested, and you believe you could help this server, please take contact with us. (Via forum or webclient, PM’s etc.)]

Features:

•Full-screen mode
•24/7 Online
•Custom mini-games
•Most skills [100%]
•No DC’s, very stable
•Barbarian Assault
•Redone Dungeoneering w/ no smuggling
•Etc.

Pics:

Full Duelling!

Fullscreen!

Turmoil!

Background Information:

Crystal-RS has been started in 2010 by the owners: “Svenie1 and Yoshi”. After a few days the server began to increase faster and faster. After a while we had build up a decent community. But… eventually we had no time left to spent on the server, because of school. And unfortunately, players began to leave then, and finally Crystal-RS was gone.
(Despite that, we are making our comeback, and we will seriously get back to work again. To satisfy our players, and let them have a great experience in this server.)

We hope we’ll see you at the Opening and we wish you to have the utmost fun!

Greetings,
Yoshi and Svenie1

Visit: http://crystal-rs.com/
